name: Wiz & Murray
description:
Play with a friend as Wiz and Murray, a magical duo that must rely on each other to make it through the Miserable Marsh and Mush Monsters to get back home.

Wiz is a young wizard who must defend their friend with offensive spells while Murray is a shapeshifter who must transform to help Wiz (and in turn itself) progress through treacherous terrain.

Grab a friend, and get ready for some shape-shifting spell-shooting fun.

A short game made by Gavin and Sean Henson
